mapper.insert: insert into team(team_id, team_name, league_id) select * from ( select distinct(htid) as team_id,hn as team_name, lid as league_id from info where hn not in (select team_name from team) union all select distinct(gtid) as team_id, gn as team_name, lid as league_id from info where gtid not in (select team_id from team) and gtid not in(select htid from info) ) a where team_id not in (select team_id from team)
